title: 2br - Furnished 2 BR/1 Ba Apt, 6 minute walk to Orange T
posting_body: ['Nice furnished 2 BR/ 1 bath unit on a quiet street in Somerville.', ' Please reply with a self-introduction if your inquiry is serious.', 'About 6 minute walk to Orange T line (Sullivan Sq) and 1-2 minutes to bus stops.', 'Walking distance to Assembly Row outlet.', 'Lots of restaurants nearby.', 'Easy access to Northeastern Univ., MGH, Harvard, MIT, Tufts, Cambridge, Boston downtown, and Chinatown.', 'Bedrooms furnished with full sized bed frame, desk, chair, chest drawer, etc. Eat-in-kitchen with dining table/chairs.', ' Living room partially furnished with TV stand;  Furniture could be not the same as shown in the photos.', 'Washer and dryer in basement.', 'nice backyard.', ' $2200/month plus utilities.', ' No Broker fees!', 'off-street parking possible.', ' 1-year lease.', ' Available 9/1, 2022.', 'Good credit.', 'No smoking/no pets.']
